description: Risty Elle Da Sherfied is the ruling queen of the Alayzardian kingdom of Sherfied. She was originally engaged to Leon Asperio until he was slain in the battles with Maou Galious. In the first episode she attempts to prevent Akatsuki from returning to Earth, unaware of his oath to protect the Demon King`s daughter. However, she later tries to prevent the other kingdoms of Alayzard from taking action to destroy Akatsuki and Miu on Earth.
name: Risty Elle Da Sherfied
